whyWeBuiltThis.header: This isn't just about yields. It's about fairness.
whyWeBuiltThis.story:
The same system that kept my grandmother poor — a woman who saved half of everything she earned and still didn't make it — is the same system keeping your startup's cash idle.

Banks take your money, earn returns, and give you almost nothing back. They've done this for generations. They do it to families. They do it to founders.
whyWeBuiltThis.mission: We believe founders deserve what banks keep for themselves.
whyWeBuiltThis.belief: diBoaS Treasury exists because the playing field should be level. Whether you're a grandmother in Rio de Janeiro or a founder in Berlin.

faq.description: Common questions from startup founders about treasury management.

catch.question: What's the catch?
catch.answer:
No catch. We take a 0.12% fee on yield earned. If you earn nothing, we earn nothing. Our success depends on your success.

The real question is: what's the catch with your current bank? They're earning 7% on your money and paying you 0.5%. That's the catch.

liquidity.question: How liquid is this really?
liquidity.answer: Same-day liquidity. No lock-ups. Set a liquidity threshold and we'll never deploy below that amount. Need €100K for payroll tomorrow? One click. Done.

risk.question: What's the risk?
risk.answer:
DeFi protocols carry smart contract risk. We mitigate this by using only battle-tested protocols with $10B+ TVL and multiple audits.

No investment is risk-free. We're transparent about that. But the protocols we use have secured billions for years. The question is whether the potential 14x improvement in yield is worth the calculated risk.

cfo.question: Will my CFO understand this?
cfo.answer: Yes. We provide professional monthly statements, real-time dashboards, and board-ready reporting. No crypto jargon. Just clear numbers your finance team can work with.

revenue.question: How do you make money?
revenue.answer: We take a 0.12% fee on yield earned. If you earn nothing, we earn nothing. Our incentives are aligned with yours.

minimum.question: What's the minimum?
minimum.answer: We work with startups managing €50K+ in operating cash. Below that, the yield may not justify the setup time. We'll be honest about that.

onboarding.question: How long does onboarding take?
onboarding.answer: Most companies are fully onboarded within 48 hours. Setup itself takes about 15 minutes.

regulated.question: Is this legal/regulated?
regulated.answer: Yes. We operate under the EU's MiCA framework with pending CASP authorization in Lithuania. We're building for compliance from day one.

investors.question: What will my investors think?
investors.answer: Most sophisticated investors expect treasury optimization. Earning 7% vs 0.5% extends runway. We provide board-ready materials to help you communicate this clearly.

compliance.question: What about compliance and audits?
compliance.answer: We provide full documentation compatible with standard accounting practices. Your accountant will receive monthly statements with all the detail they need.

missionFooter.body:
The financial system is designed to keep ordinary people — and ordinary companies — from building wealth. Banks take your money, earn returns, and give you crumbs.

We're building the alternative.

Whether you're a grandmother saving for your family or a founder building the future, you deserve access to the same advantages the wealthy have always had.
missionFooter.anthem: Your money. Your future. Your rules.
